import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { StudentService } from '../shared/student.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-students', templateUrl: './students.component.html', styleUrls: ['./students.component.css'] }) export class StudentsComponent implements OnInit { studentList:any; showSummary:boolean = false; StuID : number = 0; constructor(private StudentSvc:StudentService, private route:Router){} ngOnInit(): void { this.StudentSvc.getStudentList().then(res => this.studentList = res); } selectStudent(){ debugger // if(ID==this.StuID){ this.showSummary = !this.showSummary console.log(this.showSummary); } openForEdit(ID:number){ this.route.navigate(['/student/edit/' + ID]); } deletStudent(ID:number, Comment:string){ } }
